description: This Java source file defines a configuration class for auditing purposes in a Spring application. It implements AuditorAware to provide the current auditor's identifier, typically used for tracking changes in data via auditing annotations.

classes.name: AuditorAwareConfig
classes.description: Class implementing AuditorAware to supply the current user's identifier for auditing purposes.

methods.name: getCurrentAuditor
methods.description: Returns an Optional containing the current auditor's identifier, defaulting to "SYSTEM_USER" if the auth ID is empty.
